FuncDef:
The aaa offline-record command enable the record function when a user gets offline.
The undo aaa offline-record command disable the record function when a user gets offline.
By default, the record function when a user gets offline is enabled.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If users fail to get offline, run aaa offline-record command to enable the record function and locate the fault, including abnormal and normal offline record.
Follow-up Procedure
Run display aaa offline-record command to check the record when a user gets offline.
